channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA

item.title: Report E-2023120477
item.description:
Report E-2023120477

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-24T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-25
  • City: RAPHINE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: RDX, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On November 25, 2023, at 1645 ET, Emergency Response and Training Solutions (ERTS) was contacted by RDX, LLC personnel in Raphine, Virginia regarding the release of approximately (5) gallon of Professional Wire Wheel Cleaner (Corrosive Liquid, Toxic, N.O.S. (UN2922, 8, II) from (1) 55-gallon poly drums. Contractors were dispatched and upon arrival, contractors confirmed the material and the amount of the release. Contractors were able to to clean the release with absorbents and the proper PPE, and the leaking drum's top was tighten and secured to be forwarded on to the original consignee. All waste generated was containerized in (1) 55-gallon poly drum which was then taken offsite by contractors for proper disposal.
